QuestData.Title: Know Thine Enemy
QuestData.Description: It's good to see another new face here in Blood Watch, $c. Although the blood elves are the most immediate threat, there are other sinister creatures that call Bloodmyst Isle home.$B$BThe Nazzivus satyr are of particular concern. They are foul, demonic creatures, commanding dark magics and feeding on the corruption created by the Exodar's crash.$B$BWe must hold them in check, but first we must learn more about them. Go southwest to Nazzivian and learn what you can from their grotesque monument.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Nazzivus Monument in Nazzivian and retrieve a Nazzivus Monument Glyph. Return to Vindicator Aalesia in Blood Watch when you have one of the glyphs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you successful in obtaining knowledge of the Nazzivus satyr?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. Let me see what I can learn from this glyph, so we can plan our next move.
